category: Marketing Regulations/Article 12 (Rights of sports associations related to competition and event participants)
contents: Article 12 (Rights of the Sports Council related to competition and event participants, etc.) ① If consent is obtained from competition and event participants, the right to commercially utilize the following items belongs to the Sports Council. 1. Portrait, name, image, etc. of the participant wearing the official attire of the competition or event 2. Portrait, name, image, etc. of the participant obtained from participation in the competition or event (including games, practice, interviews, etc.) ② Entrance ticket or pass at the competition or event The rights to the portraits of spectators and other personnel who entered the stadium or event venue using (AD cards, etc.) are held or exercised by the Sports Association in accordance with the regulations of the competition or event, terms and conditions of admission tickets, etc.
